text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Pago Pago |image_skyline = Pagopago_amerika_sāmoa.jpg |image_caption = Pago Pago Harbor |pushpin_map = American Samoa |pushpin_label_position = |pushpin_mapsize = |pushpin_map_caption = |coordinates = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = Territory |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name1 = |subdivision_name2 = Maoputasi |elevation_m = 9 |population_total = 3656 |population_as_of = 2010 |population_footnotes = |population_density_km2 = |population_note = |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 96799 |area_code = +1 684 |website = www.pagopago.com |timezone = Samoa Time Zone |utc_offset = −11 |blank_name = GNIS feature ID |blank_info = 1389119 |coor_type = }} Pago Pago is a village in American Samoa. It is the capital of the country but not the seat of government. In 2000, 11,500 people lived there. ==References== Category:Cities in Oceania Category:United States capital cities Category:Settlements in American Samoa
